alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 6:36PM CDT until March 23 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of central Mississippi, east central Mississippi, south central Mississippi and southeast Mississippi, including the following areas in central Mississippi, Smith. In east central Mississippi, Clarke, Jasper, Kemper, Lauderdale, Neshoba, Newton and Noxubee. In south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis and Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Covington, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. * Until 1 AM CDT Wednesday * WHEN...From 1 PM CDT this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
